articles.description: Equipped with a Pixel Shift Multi Shooting that takes multiple images and synthesises them on a PC to create an image with a sense of high resolution.
articles.content: Sony India has launched two new cameras under its Alpha 7C series of compact full-frame interchangeable lens cameras - the Alpha 7C II and Alpha 7CR. The Alpha 7C II, the second-generation version of… [+3381 chars]
